ComicInfo.Title: Living Legends
ComicInfo.Summary: Our greed for knowledge recreated his telepathy. Our quest to confine him recreated his telekinesis. He has forged a paradise haven that threatens to destabilize countless governments and religions. One man wants to find out what Cable's intentions are before it's too late. Captain America guest stars in a special 25th issue story that debuts the new Cable... or is that the old Messiah?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:05:01. [CVDB106412]
ComicInfo.Editor: Joe Quesada, Nicole Wiley Boose, Ralph Macchio
ComicInfo.Characters: Atlas, Aunt May, Cable, Captain America, Deadpool, Fixer, Genis-Vell, Irene Merryweather, Iron Man, Johann Kriek, Nick Fury, Prester John, Radioactive Man, Sentry, Songbird, Speed Demon, Spider-Man, Wizard
ComicInfo.Teams: Avengers, Commission on Superhuman Activities, S.H.I.E.L.D., Thunderbolts
